content:
Welcome This is a test post to verify that the English language configuration is working correctly.
If you are reading this, it means the multilingual setup is successful!
Features to Check Menu should be in English (Projects, Search, Archives, Tags, About) Home info should be in English “Featured Projects” section might behave differently (we’ll check that)
